```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```


```{r}
data("instacart")

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Distribution of orders of specific alcohol spirits by hour of day

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  filter(department == "alcohol", aisle == "spirits") %>%
  plot_ly(
    x= ~product_name, y= ~order_hour_of_day, color = ~aisle, type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Total orders of each alcoholic spirit

```{r}
instacart %>%
  filter(department == "alcohol", aisle == "spirits") %>%
  group_by(product_name, aisle) %>%
  summarize(n_obs = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(n_obs)) %>%
  mutate(product_name = fct_reorder(product_name, n_obs)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x= ~product_name, y= ~n_obs, color = ~aisle, type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  )
```

### Chart C

```{r}
instacart %>%
  filter(department == "alcohol", aisle == "spirits", reordered == "1", order_dow %in% c("5","6")) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x= ~order_hour_of_day, y= ~user_id, color= ~product_name, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", colors = "viridis"
  )
```
